external_games.name: Alice in Wonderland Puzzle Golf Adventures
Alice in Wonderland: Puzzle Golf Adventures

name: Alice in Wonderland: Puzzle Golf Adventures
storyline: Visit the Tea Garden with its mind-bending, mazes and lush landscapes. Strategically maneuver through the Chess Fields, survive the depths of the Dark Forest, and discover the treacherous Palace with its mirrored portals and card-guard armies. The White Rabbit guides you on this epic adventure – how deep can you go? Can you find your way back home? Can you make Par?
summary: Don’t be late and get ready for the most eclectic and eccentric Puzzle Golf Adventure, Alice’s Wonderland has even seen! You are the ball! Go down the rabbit hole in over 70+ clever and sometimes diabolical puzzle levels. Aim, roll and explore the fantastical world of Alice’s Puzzle Golf Adventures, inspired by the famous Lewis Carroll novels. The Mad Hatter awaits! Or will chasing the White Rabbit drive you mad in the process?!
